issueName: [DEPRECATION] Usage of the Ember Global is deprecated (Ember.libraries.register...)
AdaptiveStore should use DI instead of initializing other stores by itself
keep getting logged out too early
Using treeForVendor with global Ember to register library triggers deprecations in Ember > 3.27
Don't use computed properties with native classes.
Uncaught (in promise) TypeError: Cannot read property 'deprecate' of undefined
add routeAfterAuthentication configuration info to the README
Include client ID in Oauth2 Password Grant
